mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_gender, user_birth, user_nickname, user_email, user_postcode,user_addr,user_detailaddr,user_extraaddr) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pass}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_email},#{user_postcode}, #{user_addr},#{user_detailaddr},#{user_extraaddr})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
Select count(*) from users where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pass=#{user_pass}
SELECT user_pass FROM users WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_email = #{user_email}
